column2: Extract the time series from one or more existing spatial maps (such as an ICA map). Required if you wish to run Dual Regression.
column3: A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’).

column2: Full path to a text file containing a list spatial maps. Each line in this file should be the path to a 4D NIfTI file containing one spatial map per volume.
Demean spatial maps before running spatial regression.
